package.name: Freightquote_com_Shipping_Module
package.summary: This is the official Freightquote extension, maintained by Freightquote.
package.description:
Freightquote makes freight shipping easy with instant freight quotes from hundreds of carriers. Choose the best freight rates for all of your shipping needs including less than truckload (LTL), truckload and more. The user-friendly tools automate the entire shipping process- quoting, BOL creation, carrier dispatching, and tracking.

Note: This is the only shipping module maintained by Freightquote
package.notes: Added debug logging option to help with installations
